title: Enu bEDali
sahitya:
Enu bEDali hariya


anupallavi

  jAnhavI janakana kandarpanayyana


caraNam 1    Enu bEDali citta cancala kaTHinana maunadindali dhare kOrelettidana inthavana
    caraNam 2    karuLahAradavana dharaNiyanu meTTi IraDi mADida kolegaDukana inthavana
    caraNam 3    araNyadi sarisi satiya kaLedana tirugi mane maneya beNNe melluvana inthavana
    caraNam 4    vasana shanyanAgi kalki Eridana kAsu kaTTiTTu kEsakki umbuvana inthavana
    caraNam 5    hayava piDidu gADigAranAgippana bhayadinda baliya bAgila kAyidavana inthavana
    caraNam 6    purava jarAsandhaniganji biTTavana nere sAdhisi shirava taridana inthavana
    caraNam 7    jagannAtha purandara viTTalarAyana bhakutarige caturmukti koDuvana inthavana
